name: focusflow
description: A Chrome extension that creates a virtual coworking environment to combat remote-work isolation and improve productivity

scripts.build: mkdir -p build && zip -r build/focusflow.zip manifest.json popup.html background.js css/ js/ images/ -x '*/\.*'
scripts.dev: echo "Load unpacked extension in Chrome by going to chrome://extensions, enabling Developer mode, and clicking 'Load unpacked'"

author: roBlockweb
